trivia

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • trivia.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Particle, Square, Triangle

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic class for all objects in the game.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller
